testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (search form, property cards, navigation)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application shows real estate content, not just 'Vite + React' text
Confirm hero section with property carousel is functional
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional real estate platform with property listings, search functionality, and interactive features
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Landing Page Content Quality Test
testCases.description: Verify landing page displays comprehensive real estate content
steps: Check for hero section with property images
Verify 'Featured Scenic Properties' section displays property cards
Confirm 'Explore Properties by Country' section shows country listings
Verify 'Why Choose NatureEstate' value proposition section
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page displays rich real estate content with property showcases, search functionality, and professional design

testCases.name: Property Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test the main property search feature
steps: Locate the search form in hero section
Verify navigation to search results page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search form successfully filters and navigates to search results with applied filters

testCases.name: Navigation Structure Test
testCases.description: Verify main navigation elements are functional
steps: Check top navigation bar is present
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation elements are present and functional across desktop and mobile

testCases.name: User Registration Process Test
steps: Fill out registration form with valid data
Verify success message or redirect to dashboard
Check for email verification prompt if applicable
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can successfully register and receive appropriate feedback

testCases.name: User Login Process Test
steps: Verify successful login and redirect to dashboard
Check that user session is maintained
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can successfully log in and access authenticated features

testCases.name: Property Listing Display Test
steps: Navigate to search results or featured properties
Verify property cards display key information (title, price, location)
Verify property details like bedrooms, bathrooms if shown
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property listings display comprehensive information in an organized, visually appealing format

testCases.name: Property Details Page Test
steps: Click on a property from listings
Check comprehensive property information is displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property details page shows complete property information with functional interactive elements

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Verify application works on different screen sizes
steps: Verify navigation adapts to screen size
Check property listings layout on mobile
Test search form usability on mobile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all device sizes

testCases.name: Advanced Search Filters Test
steps: Apply multiple filters (country, property type, price range)
Verify results update based on filters
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search filters work correctly and produce relevant results

testCases.name: User Dashboard Functionality Test
steps: Test navigation to other user features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard provides personalized experience with functional user features

testCases.name: Property Inquiry System Test
steps: Navigate to a property details page
Fill out inquiry form with valid information
Check if inquiry appears in user's inquiry history
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully submit inquiries about properties

testCases.name: Saved Properties Feature Test
steps: Click heart/save icon on a property
Verify property appears in saved list
Test removing property from saved list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can save and manage favorite properties

testCases.name: Create Property Listing Test
testCases.description: Test property listing creation for sellers/agents
steps: Log in as seller or agent user
Add property photos if functionality exists
Verify listing appears in user's listings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authorized users can successfully create property listings

testCases.name: User Profile Management Test
steps: Test profile photo upload if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully update their profile information

testCases.name: Password Reset Functionality Test
testCases.expectedOutcome: Password reset process initiates successfully with appropriate user feedback

testCases.name: Form Validation Test
testCases.description: Test form validation across the application
steps: Test registration form with invalid data
Test login form with empty fields
testCases.expectedOutcome: Forms properly validate input and display helpful error messages

testCases.name: Loading States and Performance Test
testCases.description: Verify loading states and application performance
steps: Check for loading indicators during data fetching
Check for proper error handling when requests fail
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application provides good user experience with appropriate loading states

testCases.name: Image Display and Gallery Test
steps: Test property detail page image gallery
Check image carousel functionality if present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property images display correctly with functional gallery features

testCases.name: Country-based Property Filtering Test
steps: Navigate to 'Explore Properties by Country' section
Verify navigation to filtered search results
Check that results show only properties from selected country
testCases.expectedOutcome: Country filtering works correctly and shows relevant properties

testCases.name: Natural Features Display Test
testCases.description: Verify natural features and scenic property information display
steps: Check for natural features tags/badges on properties
Test view types and nearby attractions information
testCases.expectedOutcome: Natural features and scenic property information is prominently displayed

testCases.name: User Type Permissions Test
testCases.description: Test different user type access permissions
steps: Test buyer user access to features
Test seller user access to listing creation
Verify restricted access to unauthorized features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Different user types have appropriate access to features based on their role

testCases.name: Notification System Test
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notification system works correctly and provides relevant user updates

testCases.name: Search History Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test search history tracking and display
steps: Navigate to search history if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search history is properly tracked and accessible to users

testCases.name: Footer Links and Legal Pages Test
testCases.description: Test footer navigation and legal page accessibility
steps: Navigate to Terms of Service page
Verify content is displayed on legal pages
testCases.expectedOutcome: Footer links work correctly and legal pages display appropriate content

test_execution_notes: Tests should be run on the deployed application URL: https://123real-estate-for-countries-with-nature-and-views.launchpulse.ai
Critical tests must pass for application to be considered functional
High priority tests should be executed first
Test both authenticated and unauthenticated user flows
Verify responsive design on multiple device sizes
Check for proper error handling and user feedback
